text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar Do you think that saunas could kill covid-19? Maybe they should start building extremely huge saunas for people with covid-19 to sit in for an hour. That 1 hour could possibly kill the virus because people are constantly inhaling heat. I have a few more ideas if you care to hear.
